DERBY-2425 ResultSetMetaData.getColumnDisplaySize() returns a negative value for BLOB columns for client
After multiplication (by 2 ) if the display size overflows int range, then assign Int.MAX_SIZE to display size. This behavior is same as that in Embedded mode.
